item.title: Configure CD for Azure WebApp with Terraform Provider for Octopus Deploy
item.description: In this post, I’m going to configure the continuous delivery process for Azure WebApp (Azure Function in this case, but that’s pretty much the same) with Octopus Deploy. To make it a little bit interesting I’m going to use Configuration-as-Code approach with a brand new Octopus provider for Terraform.
